overview: Filmed live in New York City as part of Webster Hall's Sonic Event series, this 2004 concert video captures the excitement and electrifying performances of hip-hop legends the Roots, who sing classics and some new tunes from their album "The Tipping Point." Up-and-coming artists the Jazzyfatnastees, Truck North, Jean Grae, Skillz, Young Gunz and special guest Mobb Deep join the Roots onstage for a singularly sensational show.
title: The Roots: A Sonic Event
